DOC.brief_summary: The aim study establish efficacy local anaesthetic TAP ( transversus abdominis plane ) block provide pain relief first 24hrs follow open laparoscopic elective abdominal colorectal operation . TAP block involve injection local aesthetic ( ropivicaine ) transversus abdominis plane abdominal wall . This injection take place induction anaesthesia , commencement surgery . TAP block propose potential safer alternative epidural anaesthesia . The block extensively use Hunter New England system last 18 month . As yet clear evidence efficacy , hence need trial . This trial would establish efficacy practice . If technique prof effective could widely use provide simple method manage post operative pain .
